titleInfo.title: Kraft Music Hall performances - NBC // Checkerboard Time radio show performances - WLS - 1941-03-07

mods.abstract: Home recorded Kraft Music Hall performances, featuring Connee Boswell and other unidentified performers on March 7, 1941 on radio station NBC. Followed by Checkerboard Time radio show performances, featuring Bing Crosby, Christine & The Rangers, The Cackle Sisters, and other unidentified performers on March 7, 1941 on radio station WLS (Chicago, IL).

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
